SEARCH
Package Model.Book

Class BookManager

java.lang.Object
Model.Book.BookManager
public class BookManager extends Object
Manages book-related operations such as saving, updating, deleting, and borrowing books. Handles persistence using JPA.

    Initializes the BookManager with the given EntityManager.
